dream.title: GËMËM
dream.subtitle: SAÑ-SAÑ CI
dream.description: Xale bu nekk am na sañ-sañ ngir topp ay gëmëmam ci football, njàng ak yokkute caractère.

excellence.title: EXCELLENCE
excellence.subtitle: JËM CI
excellence.description: Ñu ngi yokk talant yi ak caractère bi di soppi dundinu nit ñi ak mbooloo yi.

future.title: ËLËG
future.subtitle: TABAX
future.description: Andandool ak ñun ngir defar yoon yi jëm ci ndam ngir génération bi di ñëw yi gëmëm, njiit yi, ak champion yi.

mission.text: Ci Marenah FC, sunu mission mooy gis, yokk ak dooleel xaleyi am talant ci football bi di investir ci ndam bu yàgg bu sunu footballeur yi ak mbooloo mi. Ñu ngi boole entrainement football bu mag ak njàng, écoles yi di jàngale métier ak yokkute dundinu nit ngir footballeur yi am ndam ci ak ci biti terrain bi. Sunu objectif du rek jur footballeur yu mag, mais tamit defar yoon yi jëm ci ndam ci njàng, formation professionnelle ak liggéey yu am njëriñ. Suñu di yokk discipline, leadership, ak occasion yi, ñu ngi jëm ci yékkati mbooloo yi, defar ëlëg yu wér te di inspiré génération bi di ñëw ci Gambie ak ci biti.

who_we_are.title: KU ÑUY ÑUN
who_we_are.subtitle: Marenah FC lu ëpp club football la. Ñun catalyst bu transformation lañu, di tabax nit ñu mat sëkk ci sunu ñetti fondement yi.
who_we_are.photo_subtitle: Booloo ci Objectif, Wommat ci Excellence

education.title: NJÀNG
education.subtitle: Fondement bu Yokkute
education.description: Ñu ngi gëm ni njàng mooy fondement bu ndam. Sunu footballeur yi di jàng école, métier ak dundinu nit yi di ubbi bunt yi ci biti football.

football.title: FOOTBALL
football.subtitle: Excellence ci Sport
football.description: Entrainement bu mag, coaching bu professionnel ak match yu compétitif di yokk footballeur yu international paré ngir occasion yi.

character.title: CARACTÈRE
character.subtitle: Tabax Njiit
character.description: Discipline, njub ak leadership di defar sunu footballeur yi nekk modèle yi di inspiré seen mbooloo yi te di defar changement bu baax.

who_we_are.mission_text: Yokk talant yu ndaw yi ci bépp wet, defar yoon yi jëm ci ndam ci ak ci biti terrain bi di yékkati mbooloo yi ci Gambie ak ci biti.

vision.title: Sunu Vision
vision.description: Defar programme yokkute xale yu international bu boole excellence football ak njàng, di jur nit ñu mat sëkk ñu mën foyi ci niveau yi gën kawe ci football international di wommat valeur yi ak culture Gambie.
